word_mean: 测量正午日影长度的天文仪器。由竖直安放的表及在表足南北方向水平安置的圭组成。
表（具有一定高度竖直安置用来测量正午日影长度的标杆）

sentence.Network_en: In all cases the gnomon lies in the plane of the meridian.
sentence.Network_cn: 表始终都处于子午面内.

sentence.Network_en: The gnomon - and - ruler indicates the time by the length of the shadow of stylus in the sun.
sentence.Network_cn: 圭表是利用太阳射影的长短来判断时间的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 利用一枝悬挂的不锈钢指时针(gnomon), 让强烈的阳光照射投影，以显示时间。它经过一番特别精心设计而成，直径达七公尺，由坚固 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek gnōmōn 'indicator, carpenter's square' (related to gignōskein 'know')

means.word_mean: 1. indicator provided by the stationary arm whose shadow indicates the time on the sundial

auth_sentence.content: Sundials display the time with a single hand called a gnomon.
